sen.j: 高辻通（たかつじどおり）は、京都府京都市の東西の通りの一つ。
sen.e: The Takatsuji-dori Street is an east-west running street in Kyoto City.
The Takatsuji-dori Street is a street running east-west running in Kyoto City.
The Takatsuji-dori Street is a street running east-west running in Kyoto City, Kyoto Prefecture.

sen.j: 平安京の高辻小路にあたる。
sen.e: It corresponds to the Takatsuji-koji Street of Heiankyo.
It corresponds to the Takatsuji-koji Street of Heiankyo.
It corresponds to the Takatsuji-koji Street of Heiankyo.

sen.j: 東は鴨川 (淀川水系)右岸堤防から西は「高辻梅津街道」交差点まで。
sen.e: It runs in the east from the right bank of the Kamo-gawa River (Yodo-gawa water system) to the crossing of "Takatsuji-Umezu Kaido Road." in the west.
It runs in the east from the right bank of Kamo-gawa River (Yodo-gawa water system) to the crossing of "Takatsuji-Umezu Kaido Road" in the west.
It runs in the east from the right bank of Kamo-gawa River (Yodo-gawa water system) to the crossing of 'Takatsuji-Umezu Kaido Road' in the west.

sen.j: 佛光寺の南に面するため、近世までこちらを仏光寺通と呼び、現在の仏光寺通を五条坊門通と呼ぶこともあった。
sen.e: Until modern times some called this street Bukkoji-dori Street, because it faces south of Bukko-ji Temple--the current Bukkoji-dori Street was called Gojo-bomon-dori Street.
Until modern times some called this street Bukkoji-dori Street, because it faces south of Bukko-ji Temple--the current Bukkoji-dori Street was called Gojo-bomon-dori Street.
Until modern times some called this street Bukkoji-dori Street, because it faces south of Bukko-ji Temple--the current Bukkoji-dori Street was called Gojo-bomon-dori Street.

sen.j: 現在、四条通-五条通間で唯一の2車線道路として交通量が多い。
sen.e: It is well-trafficked because it is the only one street having two lanes between the Shijo-dori Street and the Gojo-dori Street.
It is fairly busy because it is the only street having two lanes between Shijo-dori Street and Gojo-dori Street.
It is fairly busy because it is the only street having two lanes between Shijo-dori Street and Gojo-dori Street.

sen.j: なお世界測地系（ＷＧＳ８４）での北緯３５度線が、高辻通南側を並行して通っている。
sen.e: For reference, the northern latitude of 35 degrees of the World Geodetic System 1984 (WGS84) parallels along the southern edge of the Takatsuji-dori Street.
For reference, the northern latitude of 35 degrees of the World Geodetic System 1984 (WGS84) parallels along the southern edge of Takatsuji-dori Street.
For reference, the northern latitude of 35 degrees of the World Geodetic System 1984 (WGS84) parallels along the southern edge of Takatsuji-dori Street.

sen.j: 単なる偶然なのか、後の世にて北緯３５度線の位置をわかりやすくするためかは定かではない。
sen.e: It is not known whether the line coincidently matches the street or it was marked so for the purpose of identifying the location of the northern latitude of 35 degrees.
It is not known whether the line coincidently matches the street or if it was marked so for the purpose of identifying the location of the northern latitude of 35 degrees.
It is not known whether the line coincidently matches the street or if it was marked so for the purpose of identifying the location of the northern latitude of 35 degrees.
